title: Cradle Mountain Luxury Alpine Cabin Retreat within Tasmanian Wilderness World Heritage Area
description:
Unplug and escape to the great Cradle Mountain, set on the edge of the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Tasmanian wilderness. Experience the untamed beauty of the dramatic alpine landscape with breathtaking views from your premium cabin and encounter Tasmania's diverse wildlife just steps from your door.

Hike the famous Overland Track, explore the national park by canoe or on horseback and admire the serene Dove Lake at the base of the mountain. Relax with a book or a glass of wine on your enclosed balcony, stay warm with heated floors and a gas fireplace and unwind in a freestanding bathtub complete with stunning views.

Be immersed in nature from the moment you arrive, with floor-to-ceiling windows inviting you to sit and admire your surrounds, and acres of true rugged wilderness calling you on a wild adventure.
offer_address: 3832 Cradle Mountain Road, Cradle Mountain, Tasmania 7310, Australia

title: Peppers Cradle Mountain Picturesque Nature Retreat within World Heritage-Listed Tasmanian Wilderness with Daily Breakfast
description:
Whisk away a special someone on a weekend of nature-filled romance with a tranquil stay at Peppers Cradle Mountain Lodge. Uncover a shining crown jewel deep in Tasmania's breathtaking Cradle Mountain that puts picture-worthy views at the forefront of every experience. Feel far away from the stressors of life, deep in one of the country's most cherished sites, overlooking Cradle Mountain-Lake St Clair National Park in the World Heritage-listed Tasmanian Wilderness. Experience a harmonious blend of rustic charm and modern comfort in cozy cabins, timber-built suites and contemporary Pencil Pine Cabins, all designed to complement the natural surroundings.

Strike a perfect balance between relaxation and adventure, with everything from thrilling bushwalks through the thriving reserves to a moment of steamy rejuvenation in the Waldheim Alpine Spa. Delve deeper into the abundance of Tasmania’s incredible wilderness with a culinary experience like no other. Sample the Highland Restaurant's paddock-to-plate philosophy firsthand with a painstakingly prepared dinner and paired local wines. For something a little more casual, enjoy a hearty meal or warming nightcap at the lodge’s Tavern Bar & Bistro while overlooking the sprawling natural beauty of the surroundings.
offer_address: 4038 Cradle Mountain Road, Cradle Mountain 7306, Tasmania, Australia
